data.author: Arthur C. Clarke
data.quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.

data.author: Sylvester Stallone
data.quote: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.

data.author: Kevin Brownlow
data.quote: Silent pictures show us how we lived and what our attitudes were. And as an art form, they can be wonderfully entertaining and often inspirational.

data.author: Ralph Marston
data.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

data.author: Saint Augustine
data.quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.

data.author: Taisen Deshimaru
data.quote: Think with your whole body.

data.author: Lenny Kravitz
data.quote: People always accuse me of being motivational in a way, like it was a bad thing, but that's just how I was raised. My mom raised me in a positive environment, with lots of love in my heart, and that reflects in my music.

data.author: Benjamin Disraeli
data.quote: Success is the child of audacity.

data.author: Mindy Kaling
data.quote: I try not to put anything political on the forefront of what I'm trying to do creatively. At the same time, I do think it's wonderful when I hear people say that it's inspirational that I'm an Indian woman on camera. My life is very diverse, and my friends are a diverse group of people.

data.author: Monty Hall
data.quote: Actually, I'm an overnight success, but it took twenty years.

data.author: W. Clement Stone
data.quote: Prayer is man's greatest power!

data.author: John Burroughs
data.quote: If you think you can do it, you can.

data.author: Bo Bennett
data.quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.

data.author: William James
data.quote: Success or failure depends more upon attitude than upon capacity successful men act as though they have accomplished or are enjoying something. Soon it becomes a reality. Act, look, feel successful, conduct yourself accordingly, and you will be amazed at the positive results.

data.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
data.quote: We're constantly striving for success, fame and comfort when all we really need to be happy is someone or some thing to be enthusiastic about.

data.author: K. Flay
data.quote: Feeling anxious or depressed sometimes is part of what it means to be a person, and it might even be essential to success.

data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
data.quote: Success has always been a great liar.

data.author: Aeschylus
data.quote: God always strives together with those who strive.

data.author: Nargis Fakhri
data.quote: Hard work and dedication is important to success, and I have those qualities.

data.author: Laurence D. Fink
data.quote: One of the key elements of human behavior is, humans have a greater fear of loss than enjoyment of success. All the academic studies will show you that the fear of loss of capital is far greater than the enjoyment of gains.
